item.description:
25 August: Rally and march for peace in Kennebunkport, ME, with Cindy Sheehan, the Indigo Girls, and Representative Dennis Kucinich. Visit kportprotest.org for more information
Since this is going on I am going to cancel the meeting but I hope to see you guys up in Maine!!
for more info check:
http://www.kportprote...
http://www.spboston.o...
item.name: The Boston Democratic Socialism August Meetup
